transcription: You are now watching the gold report with your host  Good morning, Jacob Chapel. Welcome to our Sunday morning worship service. I am your host, Chandra Dowdell, and here is your morning edition of the Gold Report. As always, we ask that you please keep those on our prayer list. For Reed families and our sick and shut-in members, in your thoughts and prayers throughout the week, your prayers matter.  host FarmShare Food Outreach, Thursday the 18th in the Fellowship Hall. Faithful volunteers and drivers are needed between the hours of 10 a.m. and 2 p.m. to assist us with this outreach effort. If you're interested, please see Sister Claudette Cromartie or Sister Melinda Harris. FarmShare is another one of Jacob Chapel's many hands-on opportunities. The food pantry is in constant need of donations. Please bring any non-perishable food items to the church.  study. This Thursday at 645 p.m., Pastor Simmons will begin a new teaching series entitled, Forgiveness, Why We Need It and Why We Must Give It. You don't want to miss this life-changing conversation that is sure to help you in your daily walk. Children and youth classes are being offered. So let's start your year off right and grow in God's Word. Want to host the Go Report? See Brother Will with the Media Ministry after worship service.  Don't forget to download the Go app where giving is as easy as ever. I am your host, Chandra Dowdell, and until next time, on your mark, get set, go, Jacob Chapel.  you
